ExecutionException(java.lang.String).Description: Constructs an ExecutionException with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to @B_java#lang#Throwable#initCause_E@.

Parameters: Throwable: the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the @B_java#lang#Throwable#getCause_E@ method)
ExecutionException(java.lang.String,java.Description: Constructs an ExecutionException with the specified detail message and cause.

Parameters: Throwable: the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the @B_java#lang#Throwable#getCause_E@ method)
ExecutionException(java.lang.Throwable).Description: Constructs an ExecutionException with the specified cause. The detail message is set to (cause == null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).

ExecutionException().Description: Constructs an ExecutionException with no detail message. The cause is not initialized, and may subsequently be initialized by a call to @B_java#lang#Throwable#initCause_E@.

ClassDesc: Exception thrown when attempting to retrieve the result of a task that aborted by throwing an exception. This exception can be inspected using the @B_java#lang#Throwable#getCause_E@ method.
